spells.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
spells.description: Grant a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

spells.name: Blistering Invective
spells.description: Make an Intimidate check against all foes within 30 feet; those demoralized also take fire damage.

spells.name: Brow Gasher
spells.description: Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent's head.

spells.name: Discovery Torch
spells.description: Object touched emanates bright light, granting Perception and Sense Motive bonuses.

spells.name: Effortless Armor
spells.description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

spells.name: Instrument of Agony
spells.description: Weapon exudes divine fury, granting a bonus on Intimidate checks.

spells.name: Magic Siege Engine
spells.description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

spells.name: Protection from Chaos, Communal
spells.description: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Evil, Communal
spells.description: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Good, Communal
spells.description: As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Law, Communal
spells.description: As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Qualm
spells.description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.

spells.name: Returning Weapon, Communal
spells.description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

spells.name: Tactical Acumen
spells.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.
